mapper.select: SELECT r.rental_id rentalId, i.inventory_id inventoryId, i.store_id storeId, f.film_id filmId, f.title title, f.rental_duration rentalDuration, r.rental_date rentalDate, r.return_date returnDate, if(DATEDIFF(NOW(), r.rental_date)-CAST(f.rental_duration AS SIGNED)>0, DATEDIFF(NOW(), r.rental_date)-CAST(f.rental_duration AS SIGNED), 0) overdue FROM rental AS r INNER JOIN inventory AS i ON r.inventory_id = i.inventory_id INNER JOIN film AS f ON i.film_id = f.film_id WHERE r.customer_id = ${customerId} ORDER BY r.rental_date DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}

SELECT c.customer_id customerId, c.store_id storeId, c.first_name firstName, c.last_name lastName, c.email email, if(c.active = 0, '휴면', '활동중') active, SUM(p.amount) AS totalPayment FROM customer AS c INNER JOIN payment AS p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE c.customer_id = ${customerId}

SELECT c.customer_id ID, CONCAT(c.first_name,' ', c.last_name) name, COUNT(*) overdue FROM customer c, rental r, inventory i, film f WHERE c.customer_id = r.customer_id AND r.inventory_id = i.inventory_id AND i.film_id = f.film_id AND DATEDIFF(r.return_date, r.rental_date) > f.rental_duration GROUP BY name HAVING COUNT(*) > 20

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customer_list
name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
mapper.update: UPDATE customer SET active = 0 WHERE customer_id IN ( SELECT customer_id FROM rental GROUP BY customer_id HAVING DATEDIFF(NOW(), MAX(rental_date)) > 365 )
